author: andschwa
body: As discussed in Slack, this uses a much better name for our build module. /cc @dantraMSFT @vors @JamesWTruher @lzybkr @ealexjordan I did a programmatic find/replace, so I don't think I missed anything (except comments in windows-build that'll get updated with the next resgen update). --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/995)
title: Rename PowerShellGitHubDev.psm1 to build.psm1
